mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_access_logs (short_uri, user, browser, os, device, ip, province, city, create_time, del_flag) VALUES (#{et.shortUri}, #{et.user}, #{et.browser}, #{et.os}, #{et.device}, #{et.ip}, #{et.province}, #{et.city}, #{et.createTime}, #{et.delFlag})
mapper.select: SELECT ip, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM t_link_access_logs WHERE short_uri = #{shortUri} AND create_time BETWEEN #{startDateTime} AND #{endDateTime} GROUP BY ip ORDER BY cnt DESC LIMIT 10
